name: pgai
description: Thin wrapper for postgresai CLI (provides `npx pgai ...` or `bunx pgai ...`)

scripts.build: bun build ./bin/pgai.ts --outdir ./dist/bin --target node && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='./dist/bin/pgai.js';fs.writeFileSync(f,fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8').replace('#!/usr/bin/env bun','#!/usr/bin/env node'))"
